text: Shivani Surve is an Indian actress known for working in television and films both in Hindi and Marathi. She made her acting debut with Navya..Naye Dhadkan Naye Sawaal playing Nimisha and is best known for her role of Vividha in Star Plus's show Jaana Na Dil Se Door. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian television actors Category:1993 births Category:Living people
title: Shivani Surve
